title: Treasure Hunt and Lunch—12:30 Session
short_description: Explore the galleries and create a kaleidoscope of art at this family favorite program. Engage in fun activities and learn all about select works as you visit five stops located across the museum’s galleries.
description:
When the Treasure Hunt ends, head to the Nichols Board of Trustee Suite for a family friendly lunch.

Please note: Tickets to the Treasure Hunt are also available without lunch. For more information on ticket options, please visit the Treasure Hunt page.

Tickets are final sale and nonrefundable. Questions? Please contact the office of the Auxiliary Board at auxiliaryboard@artic.edu.

This event is hosted by the Auxiliary Board of the Art Institute of Chicago. @AuxiliaryboardoftheAIC
location: Art Institute of Chicago, Modern Wing
buy_button_caption:
$75 per person (includes lunch)
Free for children under 2
